item.title: Coronavirus Exposes Medicine's Herd Mentality
item.description: In the 2003 movie, “Northfork,” two pseudo-government agents working for a power company try to convince a devout Mormon farmer to get out of his home before the construction of a dam floods him out. The farmer insists he must first receive a sign from God. The Mormon has built a replica of Noah’s ark, which he expects will rise with the waters and sail him and has wives to safety.
